name: Digimon Card Game Tutorial App
description:
A tutorial app that lets you experience the trading card game "Digimon Card Game" to be released in 2020!
Enjoy Digimon Card Game on your smartphone or tablet!

● Learn how to play Digimon Card Game!
Equipped with "Tutorial Mode" to understand the basic rules and "Free Battle Mode" to actually play!

●Play with 3 different start decks!
You can enjoy a free battle using the half deck of the 3 start deck!

Experience the fun of Digimon Card Game with Digimon Teaching App!

【Official site】
https://world.digimoncard.com/

[Official Facebook]
https://www.facebook.com/digimontcgen

*The target age of the physical Digimon Card Game may differ from this application.
*Those below the target age should play with the supervision of a parent or guardian.
